mletritra.definition: ta1=tr1=m1 is coquettish/flirtatious with tr2=m2 in aspect m3

mliba'u.definition: x1=m1=b1 whispers/mumbles/murmurs/coos utterance x2=b2; x1=m1=b1 speaks softly.

mlibi'e.definition: b1=m1 is breeze/zephyr from direction b2 with speed b3.

mlibra.definition: b1=m1 is somewhat big in dimension b2 by standard b3.

mliburna.definition: b1 is mildly embarrassed/disconcerted about/under conditions b2 (abstraction).

mlifegba'u.definition: m1=f1=b1 grumbles with sound b2 at f2 because of f3 (action/state/property).
mlifegba'u.notes: jvajvo definition; Gismu deep structure is "milxe gi'e fengu gi'e bacru"

mligla.definition: g1=m1 is warm by standard g2.

mlilenku.definition: l1=m1 is cool (mildly cold) by standard l2.

mliri'a.definition: r1 (event/state) mildens/allays/alleviates effect r2 (event/state) under conditions r3.
mliri'a.notes: Cf. {mliri'agau} for a person as x1.

mlisa'e.definition: s1 (agent) pets/gently strokes s2 with s3.

mo'icli.definition: c1=m1 memorizes/commits to memory c2=m2 (du'u) about subject c3=m3 from source c4 (obj./event) by method c5 (event/process))
mo'icli.notes: This word is different from {cilre} in that it doesn't include actual understanding of the memorized data but merely the storage of it in one's memory.

mo'isro.definition: s1 is a memory/storage/anamnesis containing facts/data/recollection s2=m2 within medium/substrate/containment s3, said facts related to subject m3.

mo'isti.definition: s1=m1 forgets fact/memory m2 about subject m3.

mobdu'a.definition: d1 is stingy about giving d2 to d3.

mojgau.definition: g1 reminds m1 of facts m2 about m3.

mojgaunoi.definition: x1=n1 is a message reminding facts x2=m2 about x3=m3=n2 from author x4=n3=g1 to intended audience x5=n4=m1.

mojmau.definition: z1 has a better memory than z2 with regards to facts m2 about subject m3 by amount/excess z4.

mojrango.definition: r1 is the memory faculty of body/species r2.

mojri'a.definition: r1 (event) reminds m1 of facts m2 about subject m3 under conditions r3.
